We're proud to announce that our team member Sarah Chen has successfully defended her PhD thesis on "Advanced Mutation Testing Strategies for Modern Software Systems." Her research introduces novel approaches to mutation testing that significantly improve both efficiency and effectiveness in detecting software defects.
